== Arag Libraries ==

There are several libraries in Arag project which each of them extends some libraries from Kohana. In the lake of API documentation of implemented features, this directory is a good place to start with.

Currently there are several libraries in Arag's project listed below:

|| '''Library'''   || '''Extends'''||
|| Arag_Controller || Controller   ||
|| Arag_Model      || Model        ||
|| Arag_Router     || Router       ||
|| Arag_Config     || Config model ||
|| Arag_View       || View         ||
|| Arag_Smarty     ||      -       ||
|| Components      ||      -       ||

Components and "Arag_Smarty" are implemented for Arag project and those not have parent class in Kohana.
